description: Signifies that an entity, typically the player, has successfully entered a new location entity.

playerId.description: The unique ID of the entity (usually the player) that entered the room.

newLocationId.description: The unique ID of the location entity that was entered.

previousLocationId.description: The unique ID of the location entity the entity came from, or null if this represents the initial entry into the game world or if the previous location is unknown/not applicable.
